name: Mona (Joseph TG [Mona])
description:
Mona's best friend Jewelia has been kidnapped by the Mighty Dollar. A group of baddies trying to collect the Golden Dollars to cause economic chaos in Currencia. Its up to Mona to collect em all, stop the Mighty Dollar and save Jewelia!

Mona is a simple short & sweet NES inspired platformer. As a big fan of FnaF, I wanted to make something retro similar to Scott's FnaF minigames in the series.

Controls -

E - Shoot coins

D - Shoot Jewels

W - Jump

Left/Right Directional keys to move.
